description: Custom designed for your precious  Samsung Galaxy Tab2 10.1 P5100 / P5110, Compatible With All Versions (Wi-fi, 3G, and 4G LTE (Verizon Version)), this case features a combination of functionality and style. title: MoKo(TM) 360 Degrees Rotating Stand Case for Samsung GALAXY Tab 2 10.1, Black (with Vertical and Horizontal Stand)
